name: Flooded Athens
description:
Enter a not-so-distant future, where the sea has reclaimed Athens. 

Play as Myrto, a scavenger who moves effortlessly around the city, getting wrapped up in a world shattering mystery with roots in the supernatrual. 

Explore the streets of Athens, ruled by opposing gangs, and scavenge the rubble of left behind buildings for materials and clues.

Secrets yet remain in: Athens Flooded.

----

Athens Flooded is the product of a 4 week development period with focus on art direction at The Royal Danish Academy.

Both Bachelor and Master Students have worked together to create this project which contains ~ 5-7 minutes of gameplay.

The game will not see any further development, though comments and feedback are greatly appreciated by all involved.

----
